reviews.review_text: I purchased this airpods pro 3 and i alamet sent me wrong item. i tried to return the item to walmart stores two branches they refused to give me refund and told me to call the seller in walmart online which is the item is obviously coming from their stores. i keep calling the walmart CS for help and keep padding me to go to walmart store to ask for refund which is very frustrating because i had small baby with me to keep going back en fort to walmart and waited for hours to get the problem resolve which is the problem never gets resolves. the CS in walmart even broke the airpods box and give it back to me it's gets worst the situation. when i come home i have contacted walmart again and complained regarding the issue of wrong item that was sent to me. this gives me a lesson not to purchased walmart online expensive items again because they have a very bad service either walmart stores or online give me so much stress dealing just getting my refund.

reviews.title: Keep falling out ear
reviews.review_text: I've tried every single ear tip and the headphones keep on falling out of my ear. Even when I sweat they still slip out.

reviews.title: Fit different
reviews.review_text: They don't fit as well as the 2's did
Walmart scammed me and gave me a wrong item and now im having issues with getting a refund please be aware and safe when shopping on this website
Walmart canceled my order without giving a chance to opt to wait for restock
